neptune.assembly

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • neptune.assembly.Instruction

  • public class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing an Instruction for the Triangle Abstract Machine.
    Author:
    Koen van Urk and Marcel Boersma

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String code
      Stores the assembly code of an instruction.
      java.lang.String label
      Stores the label, if applicable, for this instruction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Instruction(java.lang.String code)
      Constructor to create a new Instruction with given assembly code.

      • LOAD_ST

        public static Instruction LOAD_ST(int address)
        Helper method for creating a LOAD instruction relative to the stack top. As an example LOAD_ST(4) will generate LOAD(1) -4[ST]. Note the minus!
        Parameters:
        address - Address relative to ST.
        Returns:
        New instruction.

      • LOAD

        public static Instruction LOAD(int address,
               int words)
        Helper method for creating a LOAD instruction for a given number of words.
        Parameters:
        address - Address relative to LB.
        words - Number of words to load.
        Returns:
        New instruction.

        Returns:
        New instruction.

      • LABEL

        public static Instruction LABEL(int labelNumber)
        Helper method to create a numeric label. Labels generated this way are prefixed with an L.
        Parameters:
        labelNumber - Number for this label.
        Returns:
        New labeled empty instruction.

      • LABEL

        Helper method create a label based on a string.
        Parameters:
        str - Text for this label.
        Returns:
        New labeled empty node.

        labelNumber - Label number to jump to.
        Returns:
        New instruction.

        New instruction.

      • CALL

        public static Instruction CALL(java.lang.String operatorType)
        Helper method to create a CALL instruction to an mnemonic.
        Parameters:
        operatorType - One of the mnemonic values as defined in the TAM specification.
        Returns:
        New instruction.

        Parameters:

        New instruction.

      • RETURN

        public static Instruction RETURN(int return_size,
                 int pop_n_word)
        Helper method to create a RETURN instruction.
        Parameters:
        return_size - Size in words of the result.
        pop_n_word - Size in words of the arguments that were used for the function call.
        Returns:
        New instruction.

      • convertFunctionNameToLabel

        public static java.lang.String convertFunctionNameToLabel(java.lang.String funcName)
        Helper method to generate a unique label for a function. It converts all character to their ASCII value and combines this.
        Parameters:
        funcName - Name of the function.
        Returns:
        Unique name for a function label.
